thread.title: Video: Pittsburg High band interrupted by Deer Valley players
thread.title_full: Video: Pittsburg High band interrupted by Deer Valley players

author:
Mike Wood 

mwood@bayareanewsgroup.com
title: Video: Pittsburg High band interrupted by Deer Valley players
text:
Video: Pittsburg High band interrupted by Deer Valley players By Mike Wood Posted: 10/17/2015 01:28:03 PM PDT Updated: 10/17/2015 01:32:19 PM PDT Warning: Profanity An incident happened prior to Friday's game at Pittsburg High School, when some of Deer Valley football players's pregame practicing interrupted the Pittsburg High Band's pregame performance, including part of the National Anthem. 
Deer Valley ended up being penalized 15 yards for unsportsmanlike conduct before the kickoff. Pittsburg won the game 31-28. 
Check back here for more on this developing story. 
To see video go to https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NZFAx7D95fw&feature=youtube 
Warning: there is some profanity audible in a portion of the video Advertisement
